options.description: Used as an array to hold the dropdown options

selectedIndex.description: Used to indicate the selected option

dropUp.description: Sets the opened direction of the dropdown to up when true

name.description: Used to select the icon based on icon name.

size.description: Sets the size of the Icon.

variant.description: Sets the variant of the Icon.

tooltip.description: Sets the Icon to have a tooltip when passed a string

variant.description: Sets the variant of the Loading Indicator.

duration.description: Sets the duration of the Loading Indicator animation cycle.

variant.description: Sets the variant of the Progress Bar.

steps.description: Sets the number of steps the progress bar will have.

step.description: Sets the initial step for the progress bar when rendered.

markdown.description: If set, this string will be parsed as Markdown and rendered as HTML.

size.description: Sets the size of the Rich Text.

value.description: Sets value to prepopulate the Text Field.

disabled.description: Sets the Text Field to be disabled when true.

multiline.description: Sets the Text Field to be a textarea when true.

state.description: Sets the state of the Text Field

id.description: Sets the `id` of the Text Field if set, otherwise the ID is generated.

focused.description: Sets the Text Field as focused when true.

variant.description: Sets the variant of the Toggle.

type.description: Sets the type of the Toggle.

name.description: Sets the `name` attribute on the Toggle.

checked.description: Sets the `checked` attrtibute on the Toggle when true.

id.description: Sets the `id` of the Toggle if set, otherwise the ID is generated.

value.description: Used as a switch when the Toggle is clicked.

group.description: Used to bind the Toggle to a group.

disabled.description: Sets the `disabled` attribute on the Toggle when true.

selected.description: Sets the selected state of the Toggle when true.

onIcon.description: Used to set the On icon of the Toggle switch thumb.

offIcon.description: Used to set the Off icon of the Toggle switch thumb.

value.description: Used to display the Alert when true.

id.description: Sets the `id` of the Alert if set, otherwise the ID is generated.

dismissable.description: Sets the Alert to be dismissable when true.

variant.description: Sets the variant of the Alert.

modal.description: Sets the Alert as a modal.

href.description: Renders the Breadcrumb as an `a` tag when set.

id.description: Sets the `id` of the Button if set, otherwise the ID is generated.

value.description: Used as a switch when the button is clicked.

variant.description: Sets the variant of the Button.

size.description: Sets the size of the Button.

outline.description: Sets the Button to outlined when true.

circle.description: Sets the Button to have circular edges when true.

block.description: Sets the Button to act as a block element when true.

href.description: Renders the Button as an `a` tag when set.

disabled.description: Sets the `disabled` attribute on the Button when true.

type.description: Sets the type of the Control.

state.description: Sets the state of the Control.

id.description: Sets the `id` of the Control if set, otherwise the ID is generated.

label.description: Sets the label of the Control if set.

message.description: Sets the warning message of the Control if set.

width.description: Sets the width of the Control inside current container.

name.description: Set the `name` attribute on the Control when used.

group.description: Set the Control as part of a group when true.

variant.description: Sets the variant of the CTA List.

type.description: Sets the type of the CTA List.

id.description: Sets the `id` of the FileUpload if set, otherwise the ID is generated.

name.description: Sets the `name` attribute on the File Upload.

uploaded.description: Sets the uploaded state of the File Upload, must be initialized as false. When true file input will be disabled.

size.description: Sets the size of the Heading.

variant.description: Sets the variant of the Heading.

orientation.description: Sets the orientation of the Menu.

id.description: Sets the `id` of the Menu if set, otherwise the ID is generated.

name.description: Sets the `name` attribute on the Menu.

seed.description: Sets the array of objects that populate Mnemonic.

length.description: Sets the total number of items that populate Mnemonic.

index.description: Sets the index used to select the clicked word.

id.description: Sets the `id` of the Word if set, otherwise the ID is generated.

ref.description: Sets the `ref` attribute on the Pagination

items.description: Sets the data used by Pagination.

itemsPerPage.description: Sets the number of items per page.

pageNumber.description: Sets the page number og Pagination

password.description: Sets the password value used by PasswordStrengh.

multiselect.description: Sets the Accordion so multiple items can be opened at the same time when true.

variant.description: Sets the variant of the Card.

state.description: Sets the state of the Card. Only works with default variant.

href.description: Renders the Card as an `a` tag when set.

disabled.description: Sets the `disabled` attribute on the Card when true.

id.description: Sets the `id` of the Cookie Banner if set, otherwise the ID is generated.

cookie.description: Sets the cookie name for the Cookie Banner.

config.description: Sets the configuration object used by the Cookie Banner. Which contains the cookie options and their description and the domain and path where the Cookie Banner resides.

description.description: Sets the desrciption text of the Cookie Banner.

type.description: Sets the variant of the Button.

social.description: Sets the object used to define the social icons and their links.

categories.description: Sets the object used to define the sitemap and it's links.

submitHandler.description: Sets the function used for handling the submit event

schema.description: Sets the schema used for validating the Form fields.

fields.description: Sets the object that holds all the input data from the Form fields.

submitted.description: Used to keep track of Form submission.

apps.description: Used to display an app menu unless `$$slots.apps` is passed.

links.description: Used to display a menu with links unless `$$slots.links` is passed.

id.description: Sets the `id` of the Navbar if set, otherwise the ID is generated.

data.description: Provides the dataset to be searched over.

fieldButton.description: Used to add a search button to the input field when true

data.description: Sets the data displayed in the Table.

settings.description: Sets the settings available in the Table.

stepCount.description: Sets the maximum number of steps in the Wizard.
